definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Xi4 ju4 Xue2 yuan4
Zhong1 yang1 Xi4 ju4 Xue2 yuan4
xi4 ju4 hua4 ren2 ge2 wei2 chang2

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戏剧性的是，目标驱动的搜索引擎营销活动的介绍。

sentences.english: My extracurricular activities include the Math and Drama Clubs.
sentences.chinese: 我的课余活动包括参加数学兴趣小组和戏剧社。

sentences.english: Remember to spend a day in Central Park watching a play by Shakespeare in the open air.
sentences.chinese: 记得花一天时间在中央公园露天看莎士比亚的戏剧。

sentences.english: The plots are complicated, and they are flexuous and dramatic.
sentences.chinese: 情节是复杂的，他们是曲折和戏剧。

sentences.english: Shanghai Theater Academy is full of southern graceful and pleasant girls.
sentences.chinese: 上海戏剧学院的美女多是南派气质，婉约可人。

sentences.english: "Wang Zhaojun" is one of Caoyu's famous dramas in his late years.
sentences.chinese: 《王昭君》是曹禺先生晚年戏剧创作的代表作之一。

sentences.english: Oh, she said with an overly dramatic hit to her forehead.
sentences.chinese: 哦，她极富戏剧性地伸手拍一下额头，说。

sentences.english: A group of actors are rehearsing a play about Joan of Arc.
sentences.chinese: 一个艺术团正在排演一部有关圣女贞德的戏剧。

sentences.english: The Dramatic Society are doing 'Hamlet next year.
sentences.chinese: 戏剧社准备明年演出《哈姆雷特》。

sentences.english: Religious cultures produce poetry and theater, not novels.
sentences.chinese: 宗教文化滋生出诗歌和戏剧，而非小说。

sentences.english: Nancy:This theatre company is very avantgarde.
sentences.chinese: 这个戏剧团的演出非常前卫。

sentences.english: Before being engaged in movie business, his favorite was drama.
sentences.chinese: 在从事电影事业之前，黎民伟最喜爱的还是戏剧。

sentences.english: "Waiting for Godot" has been regarded as a masterpiece of "Theatre of the Absurd".
sentences.chinese: 《等待戈多》一直被认为是荒诞派戏剧的代表作品。

sentences.english: Stylization is a common feature of classical oriental opera.
sentences.chinese: 程式化是东方古典戏剧的共同特征。

sentences.english: The BBC plans to televise all Shakespear's plays.
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司计划播放莎士比亚的全部戏剧。

sentences.english: Graduated from the Shanghai Theatre Academy.
sentences.chinese: 毕业于上海戏剧学院表演系。

definition: to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
